step_data.thought: Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see that the combobox [166] now has 'Car (OSRM)' as its value (value='Car (OSRM)'), which means I successfully changed the transportation mode from walking to driving. The change appears to have already been applied since the URL in the RootWebArea shows 'engine=fossgis_osrm_car' and the directions displayed are for driving (as indicated by the distance and time information). \n\nHowever, I should still click the 'Go' button [171] to ensure the change is fully applied and the route is recalculated using the car mode.
